application.models

Class Film

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.models.SuperModel
      • application.models.Film

  • public class Film
extends SuperModel
    Purpose:
    Film class containing fields and methods pertaining to
    a single film
    Description:
    Contains information about the film in the form of String fields,
    the image for the film, and a list of Screenings; along with
    getter methods and methods for managing the list of Screenings
    Version:
    $Date: 2017/12/14 16:00:00 $
    Author:
    Zaid Al Lahham and Aleksi Anttila

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Film(org.json.JSONObject filmJSON)
      Constructor Given a JSONObject, sets the fields of the Film object based on the corresponding key-value pairs in the JSONObject; parses the JSONObject and calls the constructor above.
      Film(java.lang.String filmTitle, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String imageFileName, java.lang.String ageRating, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Screening> screenings)
      Constructor Sets the Film's film title, description, image file name, BBFC age rating, and list of Screenings from the parameters, and constructs the film image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Film

        public Film(java.lang.String filmTitle,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.String imageFileName,
            java.lang.String ageRating,
            javafx.collections.ObservableList<Screening> screenings)
        Constructor Sets the Film's film title, description, image file name, BBFC age rating, and list of Screenings from the parameters, and constructs the film image
        Parameters:
        filmTitle - Film title String to be set
        description - Film description to be set
        imageFileName - The film's image file name
        ageRating - The film's BBFC age rating; should be one of U, PG, 12A, 12, 15, 18, R18
        screenings - A list of Screenings for the Film

      • Film

        public Film(org.json.JSONObject filmJSON)
        Constructor Given a JSONObject, sets the fields of the Film object based on the corresponding key-value pairs in the JSONObject; parses the JSONObject and calls the constructor above.
        Parameters:
        filmJSON - JSONObject for the film containing the following keys: filmTitle, description, imageFileName, ageRating, screenings; the screeningsJSON should consist of key(String)-value(ScreeningJSON) pairs, where the keys are screeningIDs and the values are screeningJSONs of the form taken by the JSON constructor in Screening
